TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit MimeFormatter extends System.Object

summary.span: 為使用 HTTP 但不使用 SOAP 實作之 Web 服務和用戶端的所有讀取器和寫入器，提供抽象基底類別。

span.span: Provides an abstract base class for all readers and writers for Web services and clients implemented using HTTP but without SOAP.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Web 服務寫入器和讀取序列化和還原序列化，分別為 Web 方法的參數或傳回物件之間的 HTTP 要求或回應資料流。Web service writers and readers serialize and deserialize, respectively, between the parameter or return objects of Web methods and the HTTP request or response streams. 類別中，建立通用介面和功能，以便讀取器和寫入器類別，用戶端與服務端。The class establishes a common interface and functionality for reader and writer classes, in both client and service-side . 類別支援.NET Framework 實作 Web 服務透過 HTTP GET 和 HTTP POST 作業。The class supports the .NET Framework's implementations of Web services via the HTTP-GET and HTTP-POST operations. 在 HTTP GET 作業要求參數進行編碼的 HTTP 要求的統一資源定位器 (URL)。In HTTP-GET operations request parameters are encoded in the HTTP request's Uniform Resource Locator (URL). 在 HTTP POST 作業中，會以 HTTP 要求主體中，如同 HTML 表單編碼要求參數。In HTTP-POST operations, request parameters are encoded in the HTTP request body, as with an HTML form. 與這兩個實作中，傳回值會出現在 HTTP 回應主體為非 SOAP XML 文件。With both implementations, the return value appears in the HTTP response body as a non-SOAP XML document. 開發人員通常不需要直接使用或其下階的類別。A developer typically does not need to directly use or its descendant classes. 相反地，當 Wsdl.exe 工具產生用戶端 proxy 程式碼，根據 HTTP GET 或 HTTP POST 的實作，它會套用每個 Web 方法，並設定屬性的和適當類型的屬性衍生自類別。Instead, when the Wsdl.exe tool generates client proxy code according to the HTTP-GET or HTTP-POST implementations, it applies the to each Web method and sets the attribute's and properties to the appropriate type derived from the class. 在伺服器上，適當的衍生型別會使用根據 ASP.NET 組態檔 (Web.config) 中的設定。On the server, the appropriate derived types are used according to settings in an ASP.NET configuration file (Web.config). 在用戶端會從 WSDL 決定適當的衍生型別。On the client the appropriate derived types are determined from the WSDL.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

param.name: type
param.span: 要建立執行個體的型別 (Type)，衍生自 。

span.span: The Type, derived from , of which to create an instance.

param.name: initializer
param.span: 物件，用於初始化先前透過 方法衍生類別之實作取得的執行個體。

span.span: An object used to initialize the instance obtained earlier through the derived class's implementation of the method.

summary.span: 建立並初始化衍生自 之具體類別的執行個體。

span.span: Creates and initializes an instance of a concrete class derived from .
A object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會建立衍生類別的執行個體，並叫用抽象的衍生的類別的實作方法。The method creates an instance of the derived class and invokes the derived class's implementation of the abstract method. 在處理要求或回應的時間叫用方法。The method is invoked at the time a request or response is processed. 初始設定式會當做參數傳遞的物件方法。An initializer is an object passed as a parameter to the method. 當做參數傳遞的初始設定式方法透過另一個執行個體的衍生類別中叫用用戶端或服務的初始化期間的方法。The initializer passed as a parameter to the method is obtained from another instance of the derived class, by invoking the method during client or service initialization.

summary.span: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，會傳回指定之方法的初始設定式。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, returns an initializer for the specified method.

MemberSignature.Value: public abstract object GetInitializer (System.Web.Services.Protocols.LogicalMethodInfo methodInfo);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance object GetInitializer(class System.Web.Services.Protocols.LogicalMethodInfo methodInfo) cil managed
Public MustOverride Function GetInitializer (methodInfo As LogicalMethodInfo) As Object
public: abstract System::Object ^ GetInitializer(System::Web::Services::Protocols::LogicalMethodInfo ^ methodInfo);

param.name: methodInfo
param.span: ，可指定要取得初始設定式的 Web 方法。

span.span: A that specifies the Web method for which the initializer is obtained.

summary.span: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，會傳回指定之方法的初始設定式。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, returns an initializer for the specified method.

returns.span: ，其中包含指定之方法的初始設定式。

span.span: An that contains the initializer for the specified method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 初始設定式會當做參數傳遞的物件方法。An initializer is an object passed as a parameter to the method. 在衍生的類別實作用戶端或服務的初始化期間叫用執行個體方法。A derived class's implementation of the instance method is invoked during client or service initialization. 稍後，在處理要求或回應的時間，初始設定式物件傳遞給靜態方法，建立衍生的類別，然後設為另一個物件的執行個體方法將它初始化。Later, at the time a request or response is processed, the initializer object is passed to the static method, which creates an instance of another object of the derived class, and then to the method to initialize it. 另一個物件會執行實際的讀取或寫入。The other object performs the actual reading or writing.

MemberSignature.Value: public static object GetInitializer (Type type, System.Web.Services.Protocols.LogicalMethodInfo methodInfo);
.method public static hidebysig object GetInitializer(class System.Type type, class System.Web.Services.Protocols.LogicalMethodInfo methodInfo) cil managed
public: static System::Object ^ GetInitializer(Type ^ type, System::Web::Services::Protocols::LogicalMethodInfo ^ methodInfo);

param.name: type
param.span: 為其取得初始設定式的型別 (Type)，衍生自 。

span.span: The Type, derived from ,- for which an initializer is obtained.

param.name: methodInfo
param.span: ，可指定要取得初始設定式的 Web 方法。

span.span: A that specifies the Web method for which the initializer is obtained.

summary.span: 傳回指定方法的初始設定式。

span.span: Returns an initializer for the specified method.

returns.span: 物件，包含指定之方法的初始設定式。

span.span: A object that contains the initializer for the specified method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 初始設定式會當做參數傳遞的物件方法。An initializer is an object passed as a parameter to the method. 靜態方法會叫用在衍生的類別的方法，以隱含方式建立衍生類別的執行個體。The static method invokes the derived class's method, implicitly creating an instance of the derived class. 在處理要求或回應的時間，初始設定式物件傳遞至衍生類別的另一個執行個體方法。At the time a request or response is processed, the initializer object is passed to the method of another instance of the derived class. 第二個物件會執行實際的讀取或寫入。The latter object performs the actual reading or writing.

summary.span: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，會傳回初始設定式物件的陣列，該陣列對應方法定義的輸入陣列。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, returns an array of initializer objects corresponding to an input array of method definitions.

param.name: methodInfos
param.span: Web 方法的陣列，對於其中的每一個方法，都會取得傳回初始設定式陣列中對應索引的物件。

span.span: An array of Web methods where, for each method, the object of the corresponding index in the returned initializer array is obtained.

summary.span: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，會傳回初始設定式物件的陣列，該陣列對應方法定義的輸入陣列。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, returns an array of initializer objects corresponding to an input array of method definitions.

returns.span: 初始設定式物件的陣列，對應方法定義的輸入陣列。

span.span: An array of initializer objects corresponding to the input array of method definitions.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 初始設定式會當做參數傳遞的物件方法。An initializer is an object passed as a parameter to the method. 執行個體方法會叫用每個執行個體方法中輸入 Web 方法。The instance method invokes the instance method for each input Web method. 這表示衍生自類別的執行個體已經建立。This means an instance of a class derived from has already been created. 在處理要求或回應的時間，在初始設定式傳遞至衍生類別的另一個執行個體方法。At the time a request or response is processed, the initializer is passed to the method of another instance of the derived class. 第二個物件會執行實際的讀取或寫入。The latter object performs the actual reading or writing.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 初始設定式會當做參數傳遞的物件方法。An initializer is an object passed as a parameter to the method. 靜態方法會導致叫用屬於所指定的衍生類別方法`type`參數。The static method causes the invocation of the method belonging to the derived class specified by the `type` parameter.

summary.span: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，會初始化執行個體。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, initializes an instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會叫用在處理要求或回應的時間，不過，初始設定式透過呼叫用戶端或服務的初始化期間的另一個執行個體上的方法。The method is invoked at the time a request or response is processed; however, the initializer is obtained by calling the method on another instance during client or service initialization.
